meta.name: description
meta.content: Buffalo Island Central School District 40 is located in Monette, AR.

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Covid 19 has had an unbelievable impact on our society in 2020. The many things that we once took for granted are no longer available to us. Our activities have been shut down, our pastimes that we have enjoyed for so many years have come to a halt. During these times of uncertainty we have had our school year cut short for the safety of society, and because of this, many of our students and parents are wondering how we can have closure for the 2019-2020 school year. The administration has been meeting to discuss and plan on how we can best provide proper closure for this school year. It is are intentions to address the situations below in the following manner:

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: 'Noto Sans Symbols',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Graduation

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: - Graduation is not a possibility at this time with the mandates that are before us. If mandates continue to be in place for the next few months, the school will develop some form of virtual graduation online.

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: It is our intentions to have a graduation possible in the months of late August or September for our seniors of 2020 when mandates are lifted.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: 'Noto Sans Symbols',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Prom-

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Our intentions are to have a BIC Student Prom Only, hopefully around the time we have our senior graduation. ( We are still working on the specifics)

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: 'Noto Sans Symbols',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Awards Programs

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: - All awards programs will take place sometime during the early part of the next school year. Awards will be based on first semester grades only.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: 'Noto Sans Symbols',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Kindergarten Graduation

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: - The graduation ceremony will also take place during the early part of next year.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: 'Noto Sans Symbols',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Athletic Program

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: - Awards will be given to students who participated in Basketball, Golf, and Cheerleading next year as well. Seniors who received athletic recognition and awards will be recognized at their graduation ceremony.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: 'Noto Sans Symbols',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

li.span: Grades

li.span: - The student work completed in the 4

li.span: quarter, either through classwork or AMI work will not be used in the calculation of the 2

li.span: semester grade. The third 9 weeks will be copied to the fourth 9 weeks and averaged for the semester grade

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Professional Development

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: - The governor has given approval for teachers to do online professional development that will count towards the 2020-2021 school year.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: 'Noto Sans Symbols',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

li.span: Special Education End of Year Conferences

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: - All conference will be done online.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: 'Noto Sans Symbols',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

li.span: OT/PT

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: - Occupational therapy and physical therapy for students will be administered at the office of the provider or the homes of individuals receiving therapy.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: 'Noto Sans Symbols',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Report cards

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: - All report cards will be mailed after all grades have been posted by teachers.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: 'Noto Sans Symbols',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Teachers in the Buildings

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: - We are still limiting teachers back into the buildings. Please make every attempt to follow this mandate. If you have to go in the building, please get approval from your building principal. As soon as we can lift this mandate, we will inform you.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: 'Noto Sans Symbols',sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: PLC Work- This is a wonderful time for our teachers to collaborate online. We need to utilize time to better prepare our instruction for the 2020-2021 school year. I would like for our guiding coalition teams to step up and make this happen

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: I am sure that we have missed something, but our intent was to give you information that we have been able to discuss. As each day brings new challenges. I am sure there will be adjustments that must be made and we will do so. I thank you for being flexible and understanding.

span.style: font-size: 13.999999999999998pt; font-family: Calibri,sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
